dogecoin.text: there now it’s a standalone meme, I will now sell it as an NFT for 42 billion dogecoin https://t.co/aPYE97gCuq

dogecoin is currently worth 12 cents

the last time i bought dogecoin i bought $25 worth at something like $0.008 (3125 DOGE)

right now that would be worth $375

but it used to be even cheaper than that

so what happens if it gets to a dollar?

well for one, everyone who bought dogecoin when it was less that a cent will have an opportunity to make a lot of money

everyone else will have a much smaller opportunity

everyone else is also trying to do this same thing, and there is a limited pool of suckers available who will buy 2 cent dogecoin

so while you might be able to gin up a small profit, you wouldn't be able to get rich with infinite money loops

now eventually this levels off and you have to wait for the next flurry of activity, which might not happen for months

also dogecoin automatically replicates periodically and reduces its own value because it was designed to have an infinite amount of availability

dogecoin was always a good way to repeatedly spam small percentage gains as long as the price was above 2 cents

you simply waited to by at sub-penny prices, then during a bull rush it would spike and crash multiple times

but anyway dogecoin keeps going up because it is worth a fraction of a bitcoin, and that fraction keeps increasing exponentially when the price of bitcoin increases

there are some fluctuations within the comparative relationship, but you can make a lot of quick money during this
